Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Only Live Once
programme.desc: Le FISE à Montpellier en France se concentre sur l'incroyable roller park où les riders s'affrontent. Nous voyons quelques-unes des meilleures stars internationales du skate en action lors de la Coupe du monde Kimberley Diamond Vert en Afrique du Sud.

programme.title: Only Live Once
programme.desc: Nous nous joignons à plus de 30 000 spectateurs à Zurich pour regarder certains des meilleurs Mountain Bike Dirt Jumpers d'Europe s'affronter. L'Andorre et les Pyrénées servent de toile de fond au Slopestyle Pro des FISE Games, et les wakeboards à câble tirent le meilleur parti de l'un des parcours...

programme.title: Only Live Once
programme.desc: s'entretient avec les professionnels lors de la Coupe du monde de BMX Supercross à Manchester, en Angleterre. programme.title: Only Live Once
programme.desc: Le Bowl-a-rama de Wellington, en Nouvelle-Zélande, est notre destination, tandis que nous regardons les professionnels faire preuve d'habileté. Alex Luger tente de conquérir tout ce qui se dresse devant lui et le BMX Supercross arrive en Argentine.

programme.title: Only Live Once
programme.desc: vous emmène aux Pays-Bas, où les pilotes de BMX Supercross locaux défendent leur terrain contre les meilleurs. Ensuite, c'est au tour du Freestyle Motocross d'illuminer la Suisse, avant que nous n'allions voir les Mountain Bike dirt jumpers à Freestyle.ch.

programme.title: GOAT : The Greatest of All Time
programme.desc: Des longboards de 4 mètres d'autrefois aux shortboards rapides d'aujourd'hui, le surf a donné naissance à de nombreuses légendes. Mais qui est le plus grand surfeur de tous?

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Il s'agit de certaines des images les plus emblématiques du sport, des moments où le temps s'est arrêté : lorsque Usain Bolt a fait irruption sur la scène olympique, lorsqu'un Super Bowl a été volé et que le Butler l'a fait, lorsque Wayne Rooney a stupéfié Sir Alex Ferguson. La série qui se penche...

programme.title: Star... ou pas

programme.title: Camp Woodward
programme.desc: For most children, summer camp is a time of singing songs by the fire, creating gimp bracelets in arts and crafts, and munching on s'mores. For a special breed of camper, however, it's the season for practicing a 180 G-Turn or mastering a 50/50 grind. "Camp Woodward" follows young daredevils-in-training into the Pennsylvania Dutch countryside, where action-sports counselors and visiting guest professionals help turn these skateboarding and BMX students into the Tony Hawks and Ryan Nyquists of tomorrow.

programme.desc: Professional snowboarder Danny Kass, winner of two Olympic silver medals and even more Winter X Games bling, teams up with Australian colleague Luke "the Dingo" Trembath for a rollicking sports travel series. If there's fresh powder and a steep incline, chances are these two fun-loving guys and their entourage are speeding there in their customized RV, eagerly awaiting the chance to display their talents. While the emphasis is on snowboarding, the energetic hosts also dabble in any other extreme sport that may come their way, as well as the usual off-hour, juvenile high jinks.

programme.title: RACER Debrief
programme.desc: Three generations of Unsers have earned 26 overall wins at The Race to the Clouds, and now a fourth-generation Unser, Loni, is looking to make her mark on the Colorado mountain, too. As she gets ready to ascend the 14,110ft peak for a fourth time, June 22, Loni joins the RACER Debrief to talk about her journey to racing at Pikes Peak, her 2025 program with BBI, Mobil 1 and Porsche, and the challenge of taking on one of motorsports' most memorable and unique events.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into the Joe Dirt side of things and how an old, beat up Daytona made it cool to drive old, rusty junk; after that, he shows what it takes to make a high-end replica of a down-and-dirty car.

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: Join master mechanic Sam Mahdavi for new projects, repairs and the best parts on the market.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: From one CART champion to another, Cristiano de Matta sits down with Paul Tracy for a conversation on following his father's footsteps into racing, a dominating debut in CART, jumping into F1 & the strength it took t come back after a freak accident.

programme.title: 2026 King of the Hammers
programme.desc: Only the strongest competitors and machines compete in this one-of-a-kind off-road race that requires both speed and survival to finish this true test of man and machine.

programme.title: 2026 King of the Hammers
programme.desc: Only the strongest competitors and machines compete in this one-of-a-kind off-road race that requires both speed and survival to finish this true test of man and machine.

programme.title: 2025 Australian Circuit Boat Racing
programme.desc: With events held at some of Australia's most picturesque locations, this championship features the most competitive high-speed, head-to-head racing found on the water down under.

programme.title: 2025 Ultimate Karting
programme.desc: The ultimate karting championship hosts drivers between the ages of 8 and 15 for the Junior classes, and 15+ for the senior classes. Competition is held within the following kart classifications: IAME cadets, HONDA cadets, Minimax, Junior Rotax, Senior Rotax, X30 Mini, X30.

programme.title: 2026 King of the Hammers
programme.desc: Only the strongest competitors and machines compete in this one-of-a-kind off-road race that requires both speed and survival to finish this true test of man and machine.

programme.title: Women With Drive
programme.desc: In this third annual summit, an expert panel discusses the current issues and needs to advance opportunities for a more diverse and inclusive environment to help grow the motorsports industry.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show -- with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot -- as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run) and hosted until his death in 2020.

programme.title: Return to Warbow

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: Dr. Ben McKenna (James Stewart) is on vacation with his wife (Doris Day) and son in Morocco when a chance encounter with a stranger sets their trip, and their lives, on a drastically different course. The stranger, killed in front of the family in the marketplace, reveals an assassination plot to the Americans. The couple's son is abducted in order to ensure the plot is kept secret, and suddenly the mother and father, with no help from the police, must figure out a way to get their child back.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: During the Great Depression, a drought is wreaking havoc on a small, destitute Kansas town. Bill Starbuck (Burt Lancaster), a slick grifter, arrives in town, promising he can make it rain in exchange for $100. His offer is accepted by H. C. Curry (Cameron Prudhomme), a rancher whose spinster daughter, Lizzie (Katharine Hepburn), is desperate for a suitor. Lizzie finally finds confidence when Starbuck, ever the smooth talker, convinces her she's beautiful.

programme.title: Montana
programme.desc: Aussie shepherd Morgan Lane (Errol Flynn) moves all the way to Montana in hopes of finding the perfect terrain for raising his sheep, but the local ranchers aren't keen on sharing their land with outsiders. Before long, Morgan clashes with powerful cattleman Rodney Ackroyd, and their rivalry is only intensified when Ackroyd's fiancée, Maria (Alexis Smith), has eyes for Morgan. However, her sympathies still lie with her lover, and it seems that only a gunfight can settle the conflict.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: When a mysterious man helps Earp with injured stagecoach passengers, Earp takes him to Dodge City, introduces him to Dr. McCarty and talks him into opening a medical practice; a smallpox outbreak leads to a disturbing suspicion about the new doctor.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Professor Moriarty follows Holmes to Switzerland and battles him to the death at the edge of Reichenbach Falls.

programme.title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
programme.desc: Artist playboy Dickie Nugent (Cary Grant) appears before beautiful judge Margaret Turner (Myrna Loy) for fighting at a nightclub, and charms her into dismissing the charge. That same day, Dickie happens to lecture at a high school, where Margaret's teenage sister, Susan (Shirley Temple), falls head-over-heels for him. Things get complicated when Susan sneaks away and is found in Dickie's apartment, and downright zany when he is court ordered to date the teen as a way of easing her attraction.

programme.title: Indiscreet
programme.desc: Famous theater actress Anna Kalman (Ingrid Bergman) has resigned herself to her single life, believing that she has missed her chance at meeting a husband. Weary of socializing in Europe, she returns to her London flat, where her sister Margaret (Phyllis Calvert) and diplomat brother-in-law Alfred (Cecil Parker) invite her to a banquet. She demurs until Alfred's banker friend, Philip Adams (Cary Grant), arrives and a flirtation begins. Their romance blossoms -- but he's already married.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: The outlaw brothers (Kris Kristofferson, Johnny Cash) go from the Civil War to robbing trains to farming under assumed names.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: The conniving Ed Barker (Dick Curtis) murders a rancher and tries to steal the ranch from his widow, Jean Andrews (Ann Doran). However, their old friend Cliff Houston (Charles Starrett) appears on the scene to try and save the day. He makes a deal with Barker and his crew to drive the Andrews herd to market and split the money, but each man really plans to con the other as soon as the time is right. Along for the ride is singing cowboy Bob Stevens (Bob Nolan).

programme.title: The Valley of Decision
programme.desc: An Irish maid, Mary Rafferty (Greer Garson), falls for Paul (Gregory Peck), who is the son of her rich boss, William Scott (Donald Crisp). To further complicate matters, Mary's father, Pat (Lionel Barrymore), lost both of his legs in an accident at the steel mill owned by Paul's father. Neither William nor Pat approves of the couple's romance, and the burgeoning relationship only becomes a bigger battleground when a strike erupts at the steel mill.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes (Basil Rathbone) saves noted Swiss physicist Franz Tobel (William Post Jr.) from the Gestapo in Zurich and smuggles him to London. There, Tobel is reunited with his wife, Charlotte (Kaaren Verne), to whom he gives a coded message in the event he disappears. Tobel presents the weapon he developed to government officials, and when he is subsequently abducted by arch-villain Professor Moriarty (Lionel Atwill), Holmes and Dr. Watson (Nigel Bruce) risk their lives to find him.

programme.title: Face of a Fugitive
programme.desc: While being escorted to jail, bank robber Jim Larson (Fred MacMurray) manages to get the upper hand on his captor and escape. Jim is surprised to see his brother appear on the scene, ready to aid his sibling. As they make their getaway, his brother and the pursuing lawman shoot each other, leaving the stunned Jim alone and on the run. Assuming a different identity, Jim travels to a mining town and befriends the local sheriff (Lin McCarthy), hoping to start over and find redemption.

programme.title: Jet Pilot
programme.desc: During the Cold War, a Russian jet enters airspace over Alaska and is escorted to an American air base. The pilot, Anna Marladovna (Janet Leigh) demands asylum but refuses to provide information on Soviet activities. Col. Jim Shannon (John Wayne) receives orders to befriend Anna in order to win her confidence and gather information. The pilots compete with each other but gradually fall in love. When it appears Anna may be deported, Jim marries her -- only to discover that she may be a spy.

programme.title: Madame X
programme.desc: Holly Parker (Lana Turner) is married to high-powered diplomat Clay Anderson (John Forsythe), but finds that her attention wanders when he's away. She starts an affair with a wealthy bachelor (Ricardo Montalban), but her life unravels when he dies unexpectedly. Her mother-in-law (Constance Bennett) advises Holly to leave Clay and their baby and start a new life. Years later, when a petty criminal (Burgess Meredith) tries to blackmail Holly, who is now a prostitute, things get even worse for her.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp takes Bat's brother Ed under his wing as a new deputy, but while Ed believes outlaws can be reasoned with, Bat knows better; two businessmen plan to kill Ed and frame Bat for the crime to secure ownership of a saloon.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: When buffalo hunter Jake Caster arrives in Dodge City and an Army sergeant dies from an apparent Indian attack soon after, Earp investigates the tragedy that claimed the life of Jake's wife and child.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp

programme.title: Crush With Lee & Tiffany
programme.desc: "Crush With Lee & Tiffany" stars outdoor enthusiasts Lee and Tiffany Lakosky, a husband/wife team whose partnership begins in the home and extends to the woods of eastern Iowa and beyond. They love to bowhunt, and when they are not in New Mexico tracking elk or in North Carolina chasing turkeys -- among other travels -- they fulfill their passion for the sport on their Iowa farm, where they practice a strict land-management program for world-class white-tailed deer. "Let them go, let them grow," is a phrase the couple favors, but when the time comes to cull the herd, Lee and Tiffany demonstrate an uncanny ability to get the job done.

programme.title: Angling Edge Adventures
programme.desc: Angling Edge Adventures puts destination fishing front and center, traveling to world-class waters across the Midwest and Canada. Hosted by the Lindner team, each episode highlights outstanding fisheries while showing anglers how to break down new water and capitalize on peak seasonal opportunities. Grounded in the proven Angling Edge approach, the series blends travel, exploration, and real-world instruction-combining time-tested fundamentals with the most effective tools and technology.

programme.title: Red Headed Stranger
programme.desc: Based on a Willie Nelson song, a spirited preacher and his wife come from the East to Montana to serve a country church. However, when overwhelming problems develop, the preacher must take revenge and attempt to save a town from a gang of cruel men.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E3 This Is My First Rodeo! As the cowboys prepare their pastures for an incoming shipment of Florida cattle, they discover their current herd has escaped through a downed fence. It's a rush to get the pasture back in shape in order to house the new cattle for the winter and ensure a healthy calving season. Bubba assembles a portable horse stall to protect his horse in a distant field. Misty's gallbladder surgery has Cody worried. After Matthew graduates from pony to big horse, he decides he wants to win his own rodeo belt buckle, so Booger trains him to compete in a mutton busting competition.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E4 A Dying Breed The cowboys head back to South Florida to move cattle across a 10-mile route for their new business partner. An old friend of Booger's grandfather leads the cattle drive and helps guide the cowboys through the swampy terrain. Reminiscing about the old days inspires Booger to organize a cattle drive of his own. The cowboys are spending more and more time on the road, and Kaley is struggling to keep things in order back at home. Cody and Misty move forward with their homebuilding plans, and they decide to host a groundbreaking party.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E8 Ordeal Lucas and Mark travel through the desert to get a supply of salt when a rattlesnake spooks their horses, causing the wagon to overturn. A horse must be put down due to injury and Lucas is also badly hurt. Mark has no choice but to go for help alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E9 The Spiked Rifle Lucas agrees to ride shotgun on a stagecoach carrying $20,000 in gold for North Fork banker John Hamilton after a man fails to show up. When three men rob the stage and take Mark hostage, Lucas must get both the gold and Mark back safely.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: Kansas Pacific
programme.desc: With talks of a Civil War brewing, Southern saboteurs know they must keep Northern forces from using the U.S. train system. They devise a daring and dangerous plan to stop and capture a railroad engine, preventing the completion of a railroad line.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E3 The Impostor When a mining accident kills wealthy cattle rancher Sam Magruder and injures Cheyenne, another man assumes Magruder's identity. Cheyenne is suspicious and takes on a job on his ranch to investigate.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E5 Desperate Measures Just as Theodore Roosevelt is finally getting his cattle operation up and running at Elkhorn Ranch, his health takes a turn for the worse, and his trusted ranch manager, Bill Sewall, must race to a Sioux village to find a cure before it's too late.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E6 On the Hunt Looking for a distraction from his tasks at Elkhorn Ranch, Theodore Roosevelt decides a hunting expedition to the Bighorn Mountains of Wyoming might just settle his mind, but he soon finds himself face to face with a man-eating grizzly bear.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E15 The Pet Lucas and Mark find out a pony they adopted after the owner was killed may have anthrax. Fears of an epidemic rise in town. Meanwhile, the killer comes to the McCain Ranch thinking that Lucas has valuable information.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E16 The Sheridan Story At the end of the Civil War, General Sheridan and his staff arrive at the McCain Ranch. Trouble begins when ex-confederate soldier and hired hand Frank Blandon confronts the general, who shot and wounded him in the war.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E17 The Retired Gun Wes Carney, a famous gunfighter, and his new wife Clair move to North Fork. They open a store and settle down. However, three outlaws come to town to challenge him. Carney refuses and they ransack his store, forcing him to put his gunbelt back on.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E18 The Photographer Abel Goss is doing a portrait of Mark standing on a North Fork street. Suddenly he sees Colonel Whiteside and his sidekick, Jamison. When he recognizes them as the cruel men who tortured him in a Civil War prison camp, problems soon arise.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E3 This Is My First Rodeo! As the cowboys prepare their pastures for an incoming shipment of Florida cattle, they discover their current herd has escaped through a downed fence. It's a rush to get the pasture back in shape in order to house the new cattle for the winter and ensure a healthy calving season. programme.desc: S1 E15 The Pet Lucas and Mark find out a pony they adopted after the owner was killed may have anthrax. Fears of an epidemic rise in town. Meanwhile, the killer comes to the McCain Ranch thinking that Lucas has valuable information.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E16 The Sheridan Story At the end of the Civil War, General Sheridan and his staff arrive at the McCain Ranch. Trouble begins when ex-confederate soldier and hired hand Frank Blandon confronts the general, who shot and wounded him in the war.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E17 The Retired Gun Wes Carney, a famous gunfighter, and his new wife Clair move to North Fork. They open a store and settle down. However, three outlaws come to town to challenge him. Carney refuses and they ransack his store, forcing him to put his gunbelt back on.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E18 The Photographer Abel Goss is doing a portrait of Mark standing on a North Fork street. Suddenly he sees Colonel Whiteside and his sidekick, Jamison. When he recognizes them as the cruel men who tortured him in a Civil War prison camp, problems soon arise.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E5 Another Man's Treasure When a neighbor asks the guys for help with his unruly herd, the cowboys ride to his rescue. But this time the cattle refuse to cooperate, and the cowboys reluctantly decide to return another day after the herd settles down. Bubba invests in a group of horses in order to train them for ranch work and sell them at a profit. Cody sets out to discover whether anything of value is buried beneath some of his land. Booger gets permission from the city to hold an old-fashioned community cattle drive, and he works with his grandma to plan the festivities.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E6 Keep Them Doggies Rollin' The cowboys make a second attempt at rounding up their neighbor's unruly herd, and this time they come out on top as they finally manage to get the cattle penned up. Booger overcomes a number of obstacles in order to pull off an old-fashioned cattle drive right through the center of town. With a number of townsfolk along for the ride, it's slow going, but if he can impress the mayor, it just might become an annual event. Grandma gives the wives a lesson in cowgirl cooking, as they prepare swamp cabbage for the hungry cowboys on the cattle drive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E10 Letter of the Law Marshal Micah Torrance arrests infamous outlaw Brett Stocker and deputizes Lucas McCain into duty so he can transport the outlaw to another town. When Stocker's gang ambush Torrance and send a letter to Lucas with demands, Lucas must act quickly.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E11 The Legacy Lucas agrees to do a good deed for Pop, the town drunk who is dying, by going along with a story that his ranch is owned by Pop. When Pop's son, Philip, arrives from back east the story backfires and now his son wants restitution.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S2 E30 Is This Fort Really Necessary? Major McConnell visits the F Troop and deems Fort Courage unnecessary and makes plans to recommend its closure. O'Rourke and Agarn scheme to get Chief Wild Eagle to kidnap two women to prove the fort's importance against Indian threats.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S1 E1 Scourge of the West Wilton Parmenter accidentally becomes a war hero when his sneeze is mistaken for a call to charge against the Confederates. He is promoted to captain and is Fort Courage's new commanding officer. Meanwhile, O'Rourke plans to impress an inspector.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E7 Calamity Jane Saves the Day Throughout Deadwood, Calamity Jane is known as a hot-tempered drunk. But when a deadly smallpox outbreak spreads through town, Calamity Jane works tirelessly to save the lives of the infected citizens who once treated her with such contempt.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Four Dead in Five Seconds Gunfight After two Mexican vaqueros cross the border in search of their stolen cattle, they are gunned down by the rustlers. When El Paso's newly appointed marshal arrests local ranch hands for the murders, he sparks one of the West's most infamous gunfights.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E1 Kit Carson: Fearless Fighter While coming of age on America's frontier, Kit Carson sets a new standard for steely nerves and fearlessness. But his legend is born when a Native woman is insulted by a notorious bully of the mountains, and Kit challenges the man to a duel to death.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E9 Spirits Rachel falls for a military division agent who has a drinking problem. When his issues start affecting her, Rachel reveals that she's had a problem with alcohol in the past. Meanwhile, with Teaspoon and other riders away, Noah heads a slim crew.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E4 Prisoner of Moon Mesa Cheyenne meets a tough as nails rancher who hires him as a foreman. He soon faces hostility from fellow ranch employees and the rancher, who has a firm grip on his land, the town, and his handicapped daughter.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E7 Riot at Arroyo Seco Cheyenne faces issues in a small town, including a dry well and anxiety from townspeople, which leads to an uprising. As sheriff, he tries to keep the peace, but the formation of a lynch mob forces him to shoot and kill a prominent citizen's son.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Last Trophy A wealthy British couple visits the Ponderosa. The wife soon finds herself attracted to the toughness of the Cartwright men. She begins to think her husband is a coward and sets her sights on attracting Adam.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E19 Shivaree A young couple traveling to Yuma to get married come across Aaron Pelser's wagon train. Pelser and his group take things too far by forcing them to marry in North Fork, which is not the friendly spirit for a shivaree. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E20 The Deadeye Kid After witnessing a murder, 16 year-old Donnel O'Mahoney panics and comes to the McCain Ranch. A posse is on the hunt for the young man, believing he commited the crime. Mark befriends and hides O'Mahoney, who is traveling west from New York.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E21 The Indian U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart escorts an Indian prisoner back east to stand trial. They arrive in North Fork and Lucas finds out that Buckhart is also an Indian who was educated at Harvard. Angry townspeople try to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E22 The Boarding House Julia Andueza opens a boarding house in North Fork. Lucas remembers her as a dishonest card dealer from the past. Her old boss arrives and tries to bully Julia into turning her business into a gambling house. Lucas realizes she has changed her ways.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E5 Another Man's Treasure When a neighbor asks the guys for help with his unruly herd, the cowboys ride to his rescue. programme.desc: S1 E21 The Indian U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart escorts an Indian prisoner back east to stand trial. They arrive in North Fork and Lucas finds out that Buckhart is also an Indian who was educated at Harvard. Angry townspeople try to take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E22 The Boarding House Julia Andueza opens a boarding house in North Fork. Lucas remembers her as a dishonest card dealer from the past. Her old boss arrives and tries to bully Julia into turning her business into a gambling house. Lucas realizes she has changed her ways.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E7 Northern Exposure In the midst of a drought, the cowboys go in search of greener pastures and travel to northern Alabama in hopes of establishing a partnership with a successful rancher. Back at home, Misty decides to sell her beloved barrel horse to a junior racer, and she's so impressed by the young girl's positive attitude that she offers to give her some barrel racing lessons. Bubba splits his time between training his new ranch horses and coming to Kaley's aid during her difficult pregnancy. Booger decides to honor Grandma by compiling a cookbook full of her famous cowgirl recipes and stories.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E8 Gator Raid With new cattle operations in both south Florida and northern Alabama, the cowboys must divide and conquer in order to handle all of the work. In Florida, cattle are missing tails and calves are disappearing mysteriously, so Booger and Bubba head south to track down a predator. That leaves Cody to singlehandedly oversee an important cattle shipment at the ranch up north. Back at home, the guys convince Bubba to wear an empathy belly in hopes of teaching him to empathize with Kaley's pregnancy pain. The whole gang pitches in to help Matthew ace his school science project.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E12 The Baby Sitter A dance hall singer asks for Lucas' help in hiding her 6-month-old baby girl from her estranged, self-righteous husband after he comes to town demanding she give the baby to him. Lucas must deal with the consequences of safeguarding the infant.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E13 The Coward George Collins, a meek young man who loves to write, moves west for adventure. However, he is soon fired as a trail cook and beaten up by trailhands. Lucas takes George under his wing to help him discover his true qualities and inner strength.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S1 E2 Don't Look Now, One of Our Cannon Is Missing O'Rourke makes a deal with the Hekawi Indians to get more blankets in exchange for letting them borrow the fort's cannon for their Moon Festival. However, Agarn is against the idea and O'Rourke didn't count on a surprise visit from General Grant.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Phantom Major A top-secret letter from Washington names Fort Courage as a test troop for a new style of Indian fighting: infiltration through camouflage. Major Bentley-Royce, known as The Phantom Major, is overseeing the operation but clearly has ulterior motives.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Gold Rush Detectives When gold goes missing from a safe in a remote mining town, Wells Fargo sends detectives Henry Johnson and Isaiah Lees to hunt down the culprits. Though the two men couldn't be more different, they must learn to work together to crack the case.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E4 Marie Dorion: Enduring Frontier Legend Marie Dorion, a member of the Iowa People and mother of two, joins her husband on a harrowing expedition to the Pacific Northwest. Though she endures brutal weather, extreme hunger, and the death of her third child, her worst ordeal still lies ahead.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E5 Gold, Glory and Custer - Prelude Assigned as a scout, Cheyenne travels with Lt. Colonel George A. Custer and his regiment into Sioux territory while they search for gold. However, events lead up to the famous Little Bighorn disaster.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E6 Gold, Glory and Custer - Requiem A disastrous massacre at Little Bighorn wipes out Colonel Custer's regiment and forces Cheyenne into hiding. But when Major Marcus Reno faces charges of cowardice, Cheyenne re-emerges to testify for him.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E10 San Francisco Ben, Hoss and Joe decide to visit San Francisco with some of their ranch hands. The hands vanish into the crowds and while searching for them, Ben finds himself shanghaied and on a ship destined for Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E23 The Second Witness Lucas' life is in danger after he agrees to testify in a murder case in another town. The only other witness was killed, and when a gun-toting stranger appears at the McCain Ranch, Lucas now finds himself in grave danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E24 The Trade Outlaw Sam Morley, an old friend, comes to the McCain Ranch. He asks Lucas to turn in him for the $500 reward and use the money to pay for his girlfriend's medical care. However, a bounty hunter has other ideas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E7 Northern Exposure In the midst of a drought, the cowboys go in search of greener pastures and travel to northern Alabama in hopes of establishing a partnership with a successful rancher. Back at home, Misty decides to sell her beloved barrel horse to a junior racer, and she's so impressed by the young girl's positive attitude that she offers to give her some barrel racing lessons. Bubba splits his time between training his new ranch horses and coming to Kaley's aid during her difficult pregnancy. Booger decides to honor Grandma by compiling a cookbook full of her famous cowgirl recipes and stories.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E8 Gator Raid With new cattle operations in both south Florida and northern Alabama, the cowboys must divide and conquer in order to handle all of the work. In Florida, cattle are missing tails and calves are disappearing mysteriously, so Booger and Bubba head south to track down a predator. That leaves Cody to singlehandedly oversee an important cattle shipment at the ranch up north. Back at home, the guys convince Bubba to wear an empathy belly in hopes of teaching him to empathize with Kaley's pregnancy pain. The whole gang pitches in to help Matthew ace his school science project.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E12 The Baby Sitter A dance hall singer asks for Lucas' help in hiding her 6-month-old baby girl from her estranged, self-righteous husband after he comes to town demanding she give the baby to him. Lucas must deal with the consequences of safeguarding the infant.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E13 The Coward George Collins, a meek young man who loves to write, moves west for adventure. However, he is soon fired as a trail cook and beaten up by trailhands. Lucas takes George under his wing to help him discover his true qualities and inner strength.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S1 E2 Don't Look Now, One of Our Cannon Is Missing O'Rourke makes a deal with the Hekawi Indians to get more blankets in exchange for letting them borrow the fort's cannon for their Moon Festival. However, Agarn is against the idea and O'Rourke didn't count on a surprise visit from General Grant.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Phantom Major A top-secret letter from Washington names Fort Courage as a test troop for a new style of Indian fighting: infiltration through camouflage. Major Bentley-Royce, known as The Phantom Major, is overseeing the operation but clearly has ulterior motives.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Gold Rush Detectives When gold goes missing from a safe in a remote mining town, Wells Fargo sends detectives Henry Johnson and Isaiah Lees to hunt down the culprits. Though the two men couldn't be more different, they must learn to work together to crack the case.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E4 Burton Mossman Crosses the Line After failing to capture the ruthless murderer Augustine Chacon on U.S. soil, Arizona Ranger Burton Mossman relinquishes his badge to cross the border. In Mexico, he goes undercover as a horse thief to join Chacon's gang and spring his trap.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E4 Marie Dorion: Enduring Frontier Legend Marie Dorion, a member of the Iowa People and mother of two, joins her husband on a harrowing expedition to the Pacific Northwest. Though she endures brutal weather, extreme hunger, and the death of her third child, her worst ordeal still lies ahead.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E5 Gold, Glory and Custer - Prelude Assigned as a scout, Cheyenne travels with Lt. Colonel George A. Custer and his regiment into Sioux territory while they search for gold. However, events lead up to the famous Little Bighorn disaster.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E6 Gold, Glory and Custer - Requiem A disastrous massacre at Little Bighorn wipes out Colonel Custer's regiment and forces Cheyenne into hiding. But when Major Marcus Reno faces charges of cowardice, Cheyenne re-emerges to testify for him.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E10 San Francisco Ben, Hoss and Joe decide to visit San Francisco with some of their ranch hands. The hands vanish into the crowds and while searching for them, Ben finds himself shanghaied and on a ship destined for Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E23 The Second Witness Lucas' life is in danger after he agrees to testify in a murder case in another town. The only other witness was killed, and when a gun-toting stranger appears at the McCain Ranch, Lucas now finds himself in grave danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E24 The Trade Outlaw Sam Morley, an old friend, comes to the McCain Ranch. He asks Lucas to turn in him for the $500 reward and use the money to pay for his girlfriend's medical care. However, a bounty hunter has other ideas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E9 Specialty Sales and Recipe Fails As the cowboys continue to expand their operation, they round up some of their cattle in north Alabama and ship them down to greener pastures in south Florida. Cody and Misty are looking for extra income but they are unsure if they have enough time in their busy schedule to stage another specialty cattle sale. Bubba's hard work pays off when he finds a buyer for the ranch horses he's been training. Booger and Jaclyn struggle to recreate Grandma's recipes for a cowboy cookbook, so they call the families together for a taste test and some honest feedback.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E10 Generations to Come Booger and Bubba struggle to keep up with ranch work while Cody is busy with his specialty cattle sale. Much to Bubba's chagrin, Booger hires their ornery old hand Billy to pick up the slack. Cody manages to pack the sale barn with potential buyers, but will they open their wallets for the high-end cattle? Bubba and Kaley turn their dining room into a playroom for their expanding family. Booger begins collecting old stories and memories from Grandma to accompany the recipes in her cowboy cookbook.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E14 Surveyors Mark overhears men plotting to rob the North Fork Bank while at a surveying camp and tells Lucas about what he heard. When Lucas questions his story, Mark runs away from home. Lucas later learns Mark was telling the truth and helps capture the men.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E15 Day of the Hunter A famous old frontiersman, with a reputation as the best rifleman around, challenges Luke to see who's really the best with a rifle.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S1 E4 Corporal Agarn's Farewell to the Troops Parmenter goes after the Colton brothers and a $5000 reward. Meanwhile, Agarn overhears the doctor and O'Rourke discussing a dire health report. Suffering from stomach pains himself, he fears death is knocking on his door.

programme.title: F Troop
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Return of Bald Eagle Bald Eagle, a crazy, unpredictable renegade, plans to attack Fort Courage alone. Captain Parmenter readies the fort for battle. However, Bald Eagle's plans fail and he is captured. He soon escapes and takes Parmenter hostage.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E6 Sister Blandina and the Killer When a bloodthirsty mob storms a jailhouse holding a man accused of attempted murder, they are confronted by a 22-year-old missionary from the Sisters of Charity. Only Sister Blandina can stop the vigilantes from taking the law into their own hands.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tom Fitzpatrick: Steadfast Frontiersman By the 1840s, the fur trade is ending, forcing lifelong frontiersmen like Tom Fitzpatrick to adapt. When he becomes a guide for some of the first Americans to emigrate to California, he faces new dangers even as his way of life is becoming obsolete.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E11 Good Night Sweet Charlotte Charlotte, an old friend of Lou's, comes to Rock Creek and stirs up bad memories of a man who had hurt them both. Lou distances herself from Kid, but when Charlotte turns up dead, Lou confronts her past. Meanwhile, Jimmy befriends a Lakota Indian.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E8 Apache Blood Cheyenne returns a young white man named Mickey, who was kidnapped by the Apaches when he was a child. Problems arise when Mickey's family isn't accepting of his Mexican wife. Mickey rebels against his family, and Cheyenne tries to save his marriage.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S4 E9 Outcast of Cripple Creek After his friend passes away, Cheyenne becomes the marshal of Cripple Creek. Disgusted by all the corruption in the small town, he resigns. His successor arrives but may need Cheyenne's help to keep the peace.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bitter Water When miner Lem Keith plans to buy land next to the Ponderosa, he goes to the owner's son, Todd, who is willing to help Lem because he is in love with Lem's daughter. Plus, they both share a common hatred of the Cartwrights.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E28 The Challenge An escaped killer wants to prove he hasn't lost his nerve when he holds up North Fork's General Store and takes Marshal Micah Torrance hostage. He provokes the town to try to face him, but only Lucas is strong enough to rise up to his challenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E9 Specialty Sales and Recipe Fails As the cowboys continue to expand their operation, they round up some of their cattle in north Alabama and ship them down to greener pastures in south Florida. programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: A homesteading family in 1867 Wyoming faces a crisis when the husband is killed and the wife must decide whether to remain or take her son and daughter back East.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E16 Mail Order Groom A mail-order husband arrives in North Fork, and finds not only a bride, but also harassment from two local troublemakers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E17 A Case of Identity Aaron Wingate lost his wife and son in a river boat fire years ago. The boy was never found. Wingate hires two private detectives who come to North Fork and decide that Mark will fit the bill. Lucas must fight for custody.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E6 Christopher Gist: Unsung Hero of the First Frontier After mapping the rugged Ohio Country, frontiersman and surveyor Christopher Gist accepts a new mission: lead a young George Washington to a remote French fort in the Ohio wilderness on a diplomatic journey which may change the course of history.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E12 Song of Isiah Isiah Burke and his wife Rosemary are abolitionists who are trying to lead a group to freedom. Jimmy, who is visiting his sister, becomes involved with them but soon finds out that their tactics are too violent.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S2 E2 The Mission Captain Pender is looking for a scout and Hoss suggests former scout Charlie Trent. Charlie is less than dependable because he feels responsible for a massacre in the past. Now, he spends most of his time with a bottle.

programme.title: My Name Is Nobody
programme.desc: A young and easy-going drifter befriends a legendary gunslinger who wants to retire. The drifter considers the shooter his hero and insists that he must face a gang of 150 outlaws before he can lay down his guns.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Silent Knife Mark, a young mute boy, arrives in North Fork. When townspeople treat Mark badly because he cannot speak, Lucas and his son, Mark, befriend him. Desperate for cash, the boy steals $500 from a stagecoach line. Lucas convinces him to return the money.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E2 Put a Ring on It When an infection threatens the herd, Bubba, Cody and Booger have to act fast. They enlist the help of young veterinary student Dakota to doctor the cows and keep the virus from spreading. Cody helps Misty take the first step towards starting her cattle business. The cowboys decide to build an office for the company, but Bubba throws a wrench into the plan when he's called to Mississippi to visit Kaley's parents. Bubba's in-laws pressure him to take a hard look at his future while Booger works up the nerve to pop the question and start a future with Jaclyn.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: A homesteading family in 1867 Wyoming faces a crisis when the husband is killed and the wife must decide whether to remain or take her son and daughter back East.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.desc: The latest news headlines and developments from all over the world. With analysis opinion and insight on the biggest stories. Providing all you need to know on the days events.

programme.title: Canyon Passage
programme.desc: (1946) Frontier western starring Dana Andrews. An ambitious businessman journeys to rural Oregon where a complex web of life and love waits to ensnare him. Directed by Jacques Tourneur.

programme.title: The Shepherd of the Hills
programme.desc: (1941) John Wayne stars as a moody young man living in the Ozarks who has sworn revenge on his long-absent father for deserting his mother. Then a kindly stranger appears on the scene...

programme.title: Written on the Wind
programme.desc: (1956) Lauren Bacall, Robert Stack, Rock Hudson and Dorothy Malone star in Douglas Sirk's drama, a commentary on 1950s life that's disguised as a lurid, glossy soap opera.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: (1984) Comedy action adventure starring Michael Douglas and Kathleen Turner. An adventurer helps a bestselling author to search for her sister, who's been kidnapped in Colombia.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: (2020) Action-comedy starring Will Smith and Martin Lawrence. Just when Marcus is planning to retire, a vengeful drug lord's son shoots Mike. Can our dynamic duo beat the cartel?

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: (2021) Violent martial arts action. A brooding cage fighter (Henry Golding) is contracted to assassinate a target but saves him instead, so that he can infiltrate an ancient ninja society.

programme.title: Good Boys
programme.desc: (2019) Coming-of-age comedy about three young boys embarking on a brand new, terrifying adventure: sixth grade. Girls, kissing and an epic four-mile journey await.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: (1942) Swashbuckling adventure with Laird Cregar and Tyrone Power. Privateer Captain Henry Morgan tries to rid the Caribbean of pirates when he's made Governor of Jamaica. Bit rich.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: (1954) Tough western. A cavalry doctor (Robert Francis) discovers a Native American tribe is dying of malaria, but his by-the-book captain (Phil Carey) refuses to allow their treatment.

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: (1948) Western. When a sadistic Union colonel (Glenn Ford) becomes a federal judge after the Civil War, his friend (William Holden) takes the deputy job to try and temper his actions.

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: (1963) Cary Grant and Audrey Hepburn star Stanley Donen's stylish Hitchcockian comedy-thriller. When her husband is murdered, a woman discovers that he was involved in a huge gold heist.

programme.title: The League of Extraordinary...
programme.desc: ...Gentlemen: (2003) Fantasy with Sean Connery. In an alternative Victorian age, can Allan Quatermain, Dorian Gray, Captain Nemo, Mina Harker and the Invisible Man avert a war?

programme.title: Alice, Darling
programme.desc: (2022) Provocative psychological thriller with Anna Kendrick. A woman's friends stage an intervention to get her to see she's in a controlling relationship. But what will the boyfriend do?

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: (2014) Tense thriller with Tom Hardy, James Gandolfini, Noomi Rapace and Matthias Schoenaerts. Two cousins get into trouble with the gangsters who use their bar to launder illicit cash.

programme.title: Heat and Dust
programme.desc: (1982) Drama with Julie Christie. A woman travels to India to learn about the scandal her great aunt was involved in 60 years earlier. Upsetting scenes/attitudes of the era that may offend.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hell and High Water
programme.desc: (1954) Cold War thriller. Richard Widmark stars as the leader of a submarine expedition, sent to the frozen depths of Alaska to thwart the Chinese communists' plans to start WWIII.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Terror by Night
programme.desc: (1946) Sherlock Holmes murder-mystery starring Basil Rathbone and Nigel Bruce. Holmes and Dr Watson are employed to protect a priceless diamond. But it's snatched from under their noses.

programme.title: Broken Lance
programme.desc: (1954) Western. A strict rancher (Spencer Tracy) treats his sons (Robert Wagner, Richard Widmark, Earl Holliman and Hugh O'Brian) as little more than employees, with fatal consequences.

programme.title: Destroyer
programme.desc: (1943) Second World War drama about a warship assigned to mail runs but that ends up engaged in battle anyway, starring Edward G Robinson, Glenn Ford and Marguerite Chapman.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: (2012) Sci-fi action-adventure starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Rihanna. When aliens land spacecraft in the Pacific Ocean, only the US and Japanese navies can save Earth. Violence.

programme.title: The Pope's Exorcist
programme.desc: (2023) Supernatural horror starring Russell Crowe, loosely based on the memoirs of a 'real' exorcist. A case of demonic possession in Spain connects to dark secrets from the Inquisition.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: (2007) Western starring Christian Bale and Russell Crowe. An impoverished rancher tries to earn some money and his family's respect by escorting a dangerous outlaw on his way to jail.

programme.title: Bros
programme.desc: (2022) Billy Eichner stars in the first studio gay romcom as a cynical monogamophobe who - in spite of himself - might just fall in love with hunky Hallmark Channel alumnus Luke Macfarlane.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Virginian
programme.desc: (1946) Western romance starring Joel McCrea and Sonny Tufts as a couple of cowboys who compete for the affections of a new schoolteacher from out east, played by Barbara Britton.

programme.title: Criss Cross
programme.desc: (1949) Muscular film noir starring Burt Lancaster and Yvonne De Carlo. A dame convinces her ex-husband, an armoured car guard, to come in on a daring robbery.

programme.title: One Day Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Anne Hathaway and Jim Sturgess and director Lone Scherfig talk about making the big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel One Day.

programme.title: Shadow of a Doubt
programme.desc: (1943) Hitchcock thriller starring Joseph Cotten as a serial killer fleeing the law. Teresa Wright is his adoring niece who, initially, refuses to believe her uncle is a murderer.

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: (1944) Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-nominated Second World War drama starring Tallulah Bankhead, William Bendix and Walter Slezak as three of the survivors from a liner torpedoed by the Nazis.

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends
programme.desc: (2019) Heart-warming comedy based on the real-life story of the Cornish folk ensemble who took the UK charts by storm in 2010, starring Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton.

programme.title: The Other Woman
programme.desc: (2014) Romcom starring Cameron Diaz, Leslie Mann, Kate Upton and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau. Three women take revenge on the man who betrayed their love. Strong language, scenes that may offend.

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: (2011) Andrea Arnold's radical adaptation of Emily Brontë's classic novel of obsessive love, anger and revenge on the weather-beaten Yorkshire moors. With Kaya Scodelario and James Howson.

programme.title: Smoke Sauna Sisterhood
programme.desc: (2023) Anna Hints's award-winning and insightful documentary centres around a group of women taking traditional smoke saunas over a period of time, in the depths of an Estonian forest.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Animal Farm
programme.desc: (1954) George Orwell's cautionary tale reimagined in cartoon form. A farm's animals revolt against their abusive owner only for the pigs to become drunk with their newly found power.

programme.title: Written on the Wind
programme.desc: (1956) Lauren Bacall, Robert Stack, Rock Hudson and Dorothy Malone star in Douglas Sirk's drama, a commentary on 1950s life that's disguised as a lurid, glossy soap opera.

programme.title: Sink the Bismarck!
programme.desc: (1960) Second World War drama. Kenneth More stars as the British captain charged with finding and destroying the Bismarck, Germany's largest battleship. Directed by Lewis Gilbert.

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: (1961) Western starring John Wayne and Stuart Whitman. A Texas Ranger is forced to team up with his prisoner while he's on a covert mission to take on a band of thieves and gunrunners.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum and Liam Hemsworth. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: (2017) Taron Egerton returns as the newest recruit to the stylish secret agency Kingsman for more ass-kicking comedy action. A star-studded cast includes Julianne Moore and Elton John.

programme.title: Babylon
programme.desc: (2022) Margot Robbie and Brad Pitt star in Damien Chazelle's opulently decadent, satirical look at Hollywood in the 1920s as it teeters between the silent the era and the 'talkies'.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

programme.title: ITV News London
programme.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Stoke 2: A broken toy in Stoke-on-Trent has bidders clamouring to buy it, Fay Rutter snaps up a painting to give to her mum, and Tim Hogarth offers one seller the shirt off his back. S19 Ep2

programme.title: New: Riddiculous
programme.desc: Ranvir Singh hosts the rapid-fire quiz as contestants Davina and Stephen, Catherine and Lisa, and Ben and Max take on Riddlemaster Henry Lewis in a bid to solve his riddles.

programme.title: New: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Kez: Kez joins Stephen Mulhern hoping to be the one to go all the way to win a life-changing 100,000 pounds - all she needs to do is beat the Banker and his mind games. S2 Ep116

programme.title: New: The Chase
programme.desc: All that stands between James from Preston, Adele from Manchester, Parminder from Gravesend, Liz from Stoke-on-Trent and thousands of pounds is the small matter of a Chaser.

programme.title: ITV News London
programme.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

programme.title: New: Fletchers' Family Farm
programme.desc: Documentary series. It's all hands on deck as the Fletchers gather in their expanded flock for an essential health check, and orphaned lamb Aga is thriving with the family's care.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Dylan confesses to April, Victoria is wracked by guilt, and Joe pressurises Robert.

programme.title: Coronation Street

programme.desc: Murder 101: Classic US action drama series. Thomas teaches a university course on the finer points of being a private investigator and helps his class delve into a real-life mystery. S5 Ep4

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Secret Snow, Deadly Snow: Classic US detective drama. Theo's investigation of the murder of a plastic surgeon shot dead in his car is complicated by later evidence about the death. S3 Ep6

programme.title: Formula E Live: Jeddah E-Prix
programme.desc: Coverage of the first day of Formula E action from the 2026 Jeddah E-Prix as British drivers Jake Dennis and Oliver Rowland look to build on their strong starts to the season.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Mekong Mutilator: Extreme fishing series. A disturbing report from southeast Asia lures freshwater detective Jeremy Wade to the shores of the Mekong to find a baby-faced killer. S7 Ep1

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The Belly Dance: US documentary series. Mike Wolfe is tempted by a retro smoking toy he finds in New Hampshire and needs Frank Fritz's bargaining skills to ensure a good price. S5 Ep13

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Arctic Thaw: Nail-biting documentary series. As the season draws to a close, Lisa Kelly faces a final challenge as she hauls a load of hazardous waste without the use of her brakes. S3 Ep13

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Breaking Through: Nail-biting documentary series. Greg Boadwine returns with a point to prove as Lisa Kelly aims to earn the male drivers' respect by hauling a tricky car-carrier. S4 Ep1

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Dynamite
programme.desc: Hard-hitting action from the world of All Elite Wrestling - the roster features world-class talent including Jon Moxley, Chris Jericho, Bryan Danielson and Claudio Castagnoli.

programme.title: Dark Side of the Ring
programme.desc: Benoit Part Two: Wrestling documentary series. The conclusion to wrestling's darkest hour as startling revelations are made about the troubled mind of Chris Benoit. S2 Ep2

programme.title: The Sweeney
programme.desc: Trap: Classic '70s police drama series. Regan and Carter are confronted by a newsman with information on an unsolved robbery, but why are the pair being photographed? S2 Ep6

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: A Lot of Bull and a Pat on the Back: Comedy-drama series. Terry is up to his neck in it when Arthur dispatches him to the countryside to make a very unusual repossession. S2 Ep13

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Motorsport Mundial
programme.desc: This programme brings you up to date with the latest action from the world of motorsport and features race coverage, insights, and behind-the-scenes footage from the best series.

programme.title: The Derby Through the Years
programme.desc: All the racing, glamour and fun of Derby Day at Epsom Downs, including performances from Shergar and Sea The Stars and interviews with sports and entertainment personalities.
